软件性能描述维度

  • 软件性能
  • English
2024-06-10
One minute to read

Table of Contents

English TermEnglish Explanation中文名称中文解释
Response TimeThe time taken for the system to respond to a request.响应时间系统接收到请求后，到返回响应所需要的时间。
ThroughputThe number of requests processed by the system per unit time.吞吐量系统在单位时间内处理的请求数量。
Concurrent UsersThe number of users simultaneously making requests to the system.并发用户数同时向系统发出请求的用户数量。
LoadThe amount of work given to the system over a period.负载在一定时间内施加给系统的工作量。
LatencyThe time taken for data to travel from one point to another.延迟数据从一个点传输到另一个点所花费的时间。
BottleneckThe limiting factor in system performance.瓶颈系统性能的限制因素。
Stability TestingTesting system performance and stability over an extended period.稳定性测试测试系统在长时间运行下的性能和稳定性。
Stress TestingTesting system performance under extreme conditions.压力测试测试系统在极端条件下的性能。
Load TestingTesting system performance under expected load.负载测试测试系统在预期负载下的性能。
Capacity PlanningPredicting and planning for the resources needed for future system loads.容量规划预测和规划系统需要的资源。
BenchmarkingComparing the performance of different systems or configurations using standard tests.基准测试通过运行一组标准测试，比较不同系统或配置的性能。
Cache Hit RateThe ratio of cache accesses that result in a hit compared to the total number of accesses.缓存命中率缓存访问的命中次数与总访问次数的比率。
